api_list.api_description: Get information about a user by their user_id.

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: The hex ID of the barter.vg user

api_list.api_description: Returns up to the top 50 players in a given skill or activity.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The category for the skill or activity.

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: The amount of players to return, max 50.

query: I need to find details about a Barter user with ID 'b1a2c3'. Additionally, can you fetch the top players in the Runescape skill category 0 and activity table 9?
